sentences.en: a major political crisis
sentences.cn: 重大的政治危机

sentences.en: An end to the crisis seems a long way off.
sentences.cn: 这场危机看来远未结束。

sentences.en: British manufacturing failed to meet the crisis of the 1970s.
sentences.cn: 英国制造业未能经受住20世纪70年代危机的考验。

sentences.en: Do you think this crisis can be settled without going to war?
sentences.cn: 你认为这场危机能和平解决吗？

sentences.en: He doesn’t seem to be very good at crisis management .
sentences.cn: 他好像不大擅长处理危机。

sentences.en: I was relieved that we had averted yet another financial crisis .
sentences.cn: 我如释重负，我们又避免了一场财政危机。

sentences.en: Natural disasters have obvi-ously contributed to the continent's economic crisis.
sentences.cn: 很显然，自然灾害也是造成该大陆经济危机的原因之一。

sentences.en: Oil companies were heavily criticized when they made large profits during the oil crisis of the 1970s.
sentences.cn: 石油公司因在20世纪70年代的石油危机中赚取了丰厚利润而受到严厉抨击。

sentences.en: The car industry is now in crisis .
sentences.cn: 汽车工业现在正处于危机之中。

sentences.en: The chief editorial writer also blames weak leadership for the current crisis.
sentences.cn: 首席社论员也把当前的危机归咎于领导层软弱无力。

sentences.en: The city had faced racial crisis and come through it.
sentences.cn: 该市曾面临种族危机，不过已经安然渡过。

sentences.en: The country is facing a crisis unparalleled since the Second World War.
sentences.cn: 该国正面临着一场二战以来前所未有的危机。

sentences.en: The country now faces an economic crisis .
sentences.cn: 该国目前正面临一场经济危机。

sentences.en: The country'sleadership had underestimated the depth of the crisis.
sentences.cn: 该国领导人低估了这场危机的严重性。

sentences.en: The crisis could well place the relationship at risk.
sentences.cn: 这场危机可能会使这一关系有破裂的危险。

sentences.en: The crisis has set off a wave of nationalist feelings in Quebec.
sentences.cn: 这一危机已在魁北克激起了一波民族独立主义情绪。

sentences.en: The crisis is rooted in deep rivalries between the two groups.
sentences.cn: 这场危机的根源是这两个群体之间积怨已深的敌对情绪。

sentences.en: the current debt crisis
sentences.cn: 当前的债务危机

sentences.en: The economic crisis was interpreted in diametrically opposing ways.
sentences.cn: 对于这场经济危机有着截然不同的解释。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister was criticized for the way in which he handled the crisis .
sentences.cn: 首相处理危机的方式遭到了批评。

sentences.en: These issues were brought into sharp focus by the Gulf crisis.
sentences.cn: 海湾危机让这些问题备受关注。

sentences.en: They had thrown their neutrality overboard in the crisis.
sentences.cn: 他们在这场危机中丢弃了中立立场。

sentences.en: This political row threatens to grow into a full blown crisis.
sentences.cn: 这场政治争端有可能演化成一场全面爆发的危机。

危机管理，处理危急的办法

trans.tran_cn: 危机的；用于处理危机的

trans.tran_en: a situation in which there are a lot of problems that must be dealt with quickly so that the situation does not get worse or more dangerous
